section.p: This class contains informatin about cancer related death.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] isCauseOfDeathCancer with data type Code
causeOfDeathCancer

Contains exactly one [1..1] icdCauseOfDeath with data type Code
icdCauseOfDeath

Contains exactly one [1..1] placeOfDeath with data type Code
This is the place of death. These codes include states of the United States as well as foreign countries. Possible values are SEER Geocodes.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfDeath with data type Point In Time
The date and tine of death.

Contains zero or one [0..1] careCenterAtDeath, where its type is Service Delivery Location
Care center at death .

Contains zero or one [0..1] autopsy, where its type is Autopsy Event
Autopsy of cancer related death

Contains exactly one [1..1] isCauseOfDeathCancer with data type Code
causeOfDeathCancer

Contains exactly one [1..1] icdCauseOfDeath with data type Code
icdCauseOfDeath

Contains exactly one [1..1] placeOfDeath with data type Code
This is the place of death. These codes include states of the United States as well as foreign countries. Possible values are SEER Geocodes.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfDeath with data type Point In Time
The date and tine of death.

Contains zero or one [0..1] careCenterAtDeath, where its type is Service Delivery Location
Care center at death .

Contains zero or one [0..1] autopsy, where its type is Autopsy Event
Autopsy of cancer related death
